title: Attribute Conversions to Marketing Channels
description: An analyst needs to run a report to understand which marketing channels are driving the most conversions.

tasks.description: Open the multi-channel funnels report in Google Analytics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent navigates to the correct report.

tasks.description: Compare different attribution models (e.g., Last Click vs. Linear) to see how credit is distributed across channels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes the data using multiple attribution models.

tasks.description: Generate a summary insight, such as 'While Organic Search drives the most last-click conversions, Paid Social is a key channel for introducing new users.'
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a nuanced insight based on comparing attribution models.
